sources.title: The Divorce of Lady X
sources.description: IMDB: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0030063/ Divorce lawyer Everard Logan thinks the woman who spent the night in his hotel room is the erring wife of his new client. Stars Laurence Olivier and Merle Oberon

sources.title: The Divorce of Lady X (1938)
sources.description: The morning after a London barrister lets a mystery woman stay in his suite, a friend files for divorce. Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/the-divorce-of-lady-x-1938/

sources.title: Divorce of Lady X (1936) Merle Oberon, Laurence Olivier | From Legal Briefs to Romantic Griefs!
sources.description:
HE STOLE HER HEART SO SHE STOLE HIS PAJAMAS! Divorce lawyer Everard Logan thinks the woman who spent the night in his hotel room is the erring wife of his new client.

Director: Tim Whelan
Writers: Lajos Bir√≥, Ian Dalrymple, Arthur Wimperis
Stars: Merle Oberon, Laurence Olivier, Binnie Barnes
Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance
Original Title: Divorce of Lady X (1936)

00:00:00 Full Movie- title credits

38:54 ! Lord Mere accuses his wife of infidelity, but his lawyer is skeptical and refuses to take the case.
48:03 üíî Leslie's husband wants a divorce and she reluctantly agrees to help him, hoping that he will marry her once he is free.

metadata.Plot: Laurence Olivier plays Logan, a barrister who falls in love with Leslie (played by Merle Oberon), the woman he thinks his client will soon be divorcing.
